channel.title: Tefcon on Call me Guido
channel.description: Recent content in Tefcon on Call me Guido

item.title: Evolutionary computation Â· TEFcon 2014
item.description: This is my presentation (spanish) about evolutionary computation for the TEFcon 2014. It was a talk about how we code and how genetic algorithms and genetic programming might help us. Because “programming should be more about the what and less about the how”. Edit: I’ve pushed the Java code for the queens problem using genetic algorithms to github.
